greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals, where column k is the expansion of e.g.f. exp(k*(1 - exp(x))).
formula: A(0,k) = 1 and A(n,k) = -k * Sum_{j=0..n-1} binomial(n-1,j) * A(j,k) for n > 0.
maple: seq(seq(A(n, d-n), n=0..d), d=0..12);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 25 2017
mathematica: A[n_, k_] := Sum[(-k)^j StirlingS2[n, j], {j, 0, n}];
Table[A[n, d-n], {d, 0, 12}, {n, 0, d}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 10 2021 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Sep 25 2017
